ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have only sent you as a mercy to all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have sent you as a benevolence to the creatures of the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have sent you forth as nothing but mercy to people of the whole world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), We have sent you for no other reason but to be a mercy for mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We did not send you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) except as a mercy for the entire world. (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him – is the Prophet towards all mankind.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have sent you (O Muhammad) not but as a mercy for the `Alamin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We have not sent you but as a mercy to the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have not sent thee, save as a mercy unto all beings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We sent thee not save as a mercy for the peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent you forth as a mercy to all mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have not sent thee except as a mercy unto the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not send you but as a mercy to all the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We sent thee not, but as a Mercy for all creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have sent you (O Muhammad SAW) not but as a mercy for the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have not sent you (Prophet Muhammad) except as a mercy to all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We did not send you except as mercy to mankind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:107] We did not send you, O Muhammad (s), except as a mercy, that is, to [give] mercy, to all the worlds, [the worlds of] mankind and jinn through you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We sent thee) Muhammad (not save as a mercy) that shields from chastisement (for the peoples) from among the jinn, humans and all those who believe in you; it is also said that mercy here means blessing.
